Member Data Documentation

AbstractCoordinate* _genCoord [protected]

Which generalized coordinate.

double _generalizedForce [protected]

Generalized force to be applied.

double _scaleFactor [protected]

Factor that generalized force will be scaled by.

Storage* _generalizedForceStorage [protected]

Storage containing generalized force to be applied.

int _genForceIndex [protected]

Index of collumn in Storage where generalized force is stored.

bool _recordAppliedLoads [protected]

Flag to indicate whether or not to record the loads that are applied during an integration.

Recording these loads takes a lot of memory as they are stored every time the derivatives are evaluated (e.g., 6 times per integration step).

Storage* _appliedGeneralizedForceStore [protected]

Storage for the generalized force that was actually applied during the simulation.

double _aTSet [protected]

variable for testing
